text: Hi everyone, I second <@U12452RAP>. The bluemix examples of marbles and paper are not working. So I'm trying to run an image of fabric-peer locally and constructed docker-compose.yml as instructed by 'Fabric Network Setup' in the docs. I'm wondering if  CORE_VM_ENDPOINT's value is what I use in mycreds.json 'api_host' of marbles app?
